name: calc
comments:
This function demonstrates how we can call a RPG program created on AS400 and expose it as a REST service.
Sample RPG Code is as below:

D$num1            S             15S 0              
D$num2            S             15S 0              
D$addRS           S             20S 0              
D$subRS           S             20S 0              
D$mulRS           S             20S 0              
D$divRS           S             20S 0              
                                                   
c     *entry        plist                          
c                   parm                    $num1  
c                   parm                    $num2  
c                   parm                    $addRS 
c                   parm                    $subRS 
c                   parm                    $mulRS 
c                   parm                    $divRS 
                                                   
                                            
  /free                                     
    $addRS   = $num1 + $num2 ;              
    $subRS   = $num1 - $num2 ;              
    $mulRS   = $num1 * $num2 ;              
    $divRS   = $num1 / $num2 ;              
    *inlr = *on;                            
                                            
 /end-free
